Name: Gold Rush on the Rocks
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Rich bourbon notes highlighted by maple syrup (particularly charcoal) in an otherwise classic sour. A tad rich for those with a dry palate.
Nutrition: One serving of Gold Rush on the Rocks contains 216 calories
